    • Uses of AbstractReceiver in com.im.njams.sdk.communication

      Classes in com.im.njams.sdk.communication with type parameters of type AbstractReceiver 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  SharedReceiverSupport<R extends AbstractReceiver & ShareableReceiver<M>,​M>
      A helper class that implements sharing receiver instances.
      Implementation notes: The actual implementations using this helper simply have to track adding and removing instances, and call SharedReceiverSupport.onInstruction(Object, Instruction, boolean) for each received (and valid) instruction.

    • Uses of AbstractReceiver in com.im.njams.sdk.communication.http

      Subclasses of AbstractReceiver in com.im.njams.sdk.communication.http 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  HttpSseReceiver
      Receives SSE (server sent events) from nJAMS as HTTP Client Communication
      class  SharedHttpSseReceiver
      Overrides the common HttpSseReceiver for supporting receiving messages for multiple Njams instances.

    • Uses of AbstractReceiver in com.im.njams.sdk.communication.jms

      class  JmsReceiver
      JMS implementation for a Receiver.

      Overrides the common JmsReceiver for supporting receiving messages for multiple Njams instances.
